body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Mark Carter and the customer's name is Debra Hughes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Mark Carter. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Mark, I'm Debra Hughes. I'm feeling a bit confused about the financing options for the motorcycle I want.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Debra. Financing can be tricky sometimes. Could you please tell me what type of motorcycle you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at the Phat Cruiser model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! The Phat Cruiser is a popular model. To help you with financing options, I need to ask for a couple of pieces of information. Could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra. And could I also have your phone number to set up any follow-up calls?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s one two three four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I appreciate that. Now, let’s explore the best financing options available for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Mark! I really appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Debra! Thank you for your time today. I look forward to assisting you further. Have a great day!
